src:
Timor Leste Bertekad Kalahkan Timnas U-19
05 Nov 2019, 22:29 by Anggi Tiar


Timor Leste Bertekad Kalahkan Timnas U-19

KBRN, Jakarta : Timnas Timor Leste U-19 bertekad meraih kemenangan pada laga perdana Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020 Grup K menghdapi, Timnas indonesia U-19 di Stadion Madya, Senayan, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019) besok malam. 
Persiapan maksimal, menjelang Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020 ini menjadi modal Timor Leste ingin menaklukan skuat Garuda Nusantara. Meski tak menutup kemungkinan, mereka mengakui bahwa Timnas Indonesia lebih diunggulkan. 
“Kami sudah bertemu. Kami memang sempat kalah di Piala AFF U-18 lalu, tapi kami sudah melakukan persiapan yang maksimal, dan kami berupaya mengalahkan Indonesia,” ungkap Asisten pelatih Timor Leste U19, Eduardo Pereira  dalam jumpa wartawan di Jakarta, Selasa (5/11/2019). 
lebih lanjut, Eduardo mengaku bahwa timnya telah tiba di Jakarta sejak 31 Oktober 2019, lalu. Hal itu dilakukan demi kembali mamtangkan persiapan menjelang Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020 tersebut. 
“Kami tiba di sini tanggal 31 Oktober, dan kami sudah siap untuk bertanding. Semoga kami bisa memberikan yang terbaik untuk negara,” tuntas Eduardo.
text:
Timor Leste Determined to Defeat the U-19 national team
05 Nov 2019, 22:29 by Anggi Tiar


Timor Leste Determined to Defeat the U-19 national team

KBRN, Jakarta: East Timor U-19 national team is determined to win in the inaugural match of the AFC U-19 2020 Qualification Group K facing, Indonesian U-19 national team at Madya Stadium, Senayan, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019) tomorrow night .
Maximum preparation, before the 2020 AFC U-19 2020 Qualification becomes Timor Leste's capital, wants to conquer the Garuda Nusantara squad. Although it did not rule out the possibility, they admitted that the Indonesian national team was more favored.
"We have met. We did lose at the U-18 AFF Cup last time, but we have made maximum preparations, and we are trying to defeat Indonesia, "said Assistant East Timor U19 coach, Eduardo Pereira in a press conference in Jakarta on Tuesday (11/05/2019) .
furthermore, Eduardo admitted that his team had arrived in Jakarta since 31 October 2019, then. This was done in order to re-prepare for the preparation of the AFC U-19 2020 Qualification Cup.
"We arrived here on October 31, and we are ready to compete. Hopefully we can provide the best for the country, "completed Eduardo.
